all: SELECT a.ID, a.AJUNUM, a.AJUFEC, a.PRODCOD, p.PRODDES, a.AJUCAN FROM ajustest AS a INNER JOIN producto AS p ON p.PRODCOD = a.PRODCOD ORDER BY a.AJUNUM DESC;
SELECT c.ID, c.CLINOM, v.VENNOM, c.CLIDOM, c.CLILOC, c.CLITEL, CASE CLIEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE CLIEST FROM clientes c INNER JOIN vendedor v ON v.VENCOD = c.VENCOD
SELECT c.ID, c.CLINOM, v.VENNOM, c.CLIDOM, c.CLILOC, c.CLITEL FROM clientes c INNER JOIN vendedor v ON v.VENCOD = c.VENCOD WHERE c.CLIEST='A' AND c.VENCOD = {search}
SELECT c.ID, c.CONNUM, c.CONFEC, c.CONDES, cl.CLINOM, c.CONCANDEB, c.CONCANHAB FROM concepto c INNER JOIN clientes cl ON c.CONCLI = cl.CLICOD ORDER BY c.CONNUM DESC
SELECT ID, ESTCOD, ESTDES FROM estados;
SELECT ID, IVACOD, IVADES FROM iva;
SELECT ID, NUMCOD, NUMDES, NUMVAL, NUMPV FROM numeros;

SELECT p.ID, p.PAGNUM, p.PAGFEC, c.CLINOM, (SELECT  IFNULL(SUM(PAGIMP), 0) FROM pagos2 WHERE PAGNUM <> 0 AND PAGNUM = p.PAGNUM) TOTAL FROM pagos p INNER JOIN clientes c ON p.CLICOD = c.CLICOD WHERE p.PAGNUM <> 0 ORDER BY p.ID DESC;
SELECT ID, IVAFEC, IVAPOR FROM porciva;

SELECT p.ID, p.PRODCOD, p.PRODDES, p.TIPCOD, t.TIPDES, p.SUBTIPCOD, t1.SUBTIPDES, p.PRODPRE, CASE p.PRODEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE p.PRODEST END PRODEST FROM producto p INNER JOIN tipo t ON p.TIPCOD = t.TIPCOD LEFT JOIN tipo1 t1 ON p.SUBTIPCOD = t1.SUBTIPCOD;

SELECT p.ID, p.PRODCOD, p.PRODDES, p.TIPCOD, t.TIPDES, p.SUBTIPCOD, t1.SUBTIPDES, p.PRODPRE FROM producto p INNER JOIN tipo t ON p.TIPCOD = t.TIPCOD LEFT JOIN tipo1 t1 ON p.SUBTIPCOD = t1.SUBTIPCOD WHERE p.PRODEST='A';
SELECT PROCOD, PRONOM FROM provinci;

SELECT r.ID, r.REMNUM, r.REMFEC, e.ESTDES, r.VENCOD, v.VENNOM, r.CLICOD, c.CLINOM FROM remitos r INNER JOIN estados e ON r.ESTCOD = e.ESTCOD INNER JOIN vendedor v ON r.VENCOD = v.VENCOD INNER JOIN clientes c ON r.CLICOD = c.CLICOD
SELECT ID, TIPCOD, TIPDES, CASE TIPEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE TIPEST FROM tipo
SELECT ID, TIPCOD, TIPDES FROM tipo WHERE TIPEST='A'
SELECT ID, TIPCOD, SUBTIPCOD, SUBTIPDES, CASE SUBTIPEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE SUBTIPEST FROM tipo1
SELECT ID, TIPCOD, SUBTIPCOD, SUBTIPDES FROM tipo1 WHERE SUBTIPEST='A'
SELECT ID, TRACOD, TRANOM, TRADOM, TRALOC, TRATEL, CASE TRAEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE TRAEST FROM transpor
SELECT ID, TRACOD, TRANOM, TRADOM, TRALOC, TRATEL FROM transpor WHERE TRAEST='A'
SELECT ID, VENCOD, VENNOM, VENDOM, VENLOC, VENTEL, CASE VENEST WHEN 'A' THEN 'Activo' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Inactivo' ELSE VENEST END PRODEST FROM vendedor
SELECT ID, VENCOD, VENNOM, VENDOM, VENLOC, VENTEL FROM vendedor WHERE VENEST='A'
